Title: Permits certain nurses to perform medication related tasks provided by a certified medication aide
Summary: Permits certain nurses to perform medication related tasks provided by a certified medication aide.
LawCode: Amd §§6908 & 6909, Ed L; amd §2803-j, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law and the public health law, in relation to permitting certain nurses to perform medication related tasks provided by a certified medication aide
